records.location_details: Location of the incident: LCC Evros. Original source of the information: Police Station of Ferres. Subject: Two bodies found on Evros Operational Area. Information/allegations: on the bank of Evros River.
records.where_clear: Evros River bank, Evros Operational Area, near Ferres, Greece
records.location_text_raw: LCC Evors, Evros Operational Area, bank of Evros River
records.context_note: Two bodies found on Evros Operational Area. On the 08.12.2019 at 11:00 HP Officers, who were patrolling the area, detected two dead bodies (female) age between 15-25 on the bank of Evros River. No travel document were found.
records.evidence_quote: On the 08.12.2019 at 11:00 HP Officers, who were patrolling the area, detected two dead bodies (female) age between 15-25 on the bank of Evros River. No travel document were found.
